TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ODataErrorHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents additional functionality for processing extended error information returned by the Windows Azure storage services for Tables. The class was created to only load the OData library when required for parsing the ExtendedErrorInformation of Tables.
